Installation & Setup¶

Here we show how to install the SegmentPy

Linux¶

Intall first conda <https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/> or python>=3.6 <https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-360/>. Then in terminal type:

$ conda install -c lrcs SegmentPy

or:

$ pip install SegmentPy

After the installation, you should be able to open from Terminal by:

$ SegmentPy
